text:
yE tE# sarasva UqrmayOq madhu#mantO GRutaqScuta#H | 
tEShA$M tE suqmnamI#mahE || 
yasya# vraqtaM paqSavOq yantiq sarvEq yasya# vraqtamu#paqtiShTha#ntaq Apa#H | 
yasya# vraqtE pu#ShTiqpatiqrnivi#ShTaqsta(gm) sara#svantaqmava#sE huvEma || 
diqvya(gm) su#paqrNaM ~Mva#yaqsaM bRuqhanta#maqpAM garBa#M ~MvRuShaqBamOSha#dhInAM | 
aqBIqpaqtO vRuqShTyA taqrpaya#ntaqM ta(gm) sara#svantaqmava#sE huvEma || 
sinI#vAliq pRuthu#ShTukEq yA dEqvAnAqmasiq svasA$ | 
juqShasva# haqvya - [  ]   37
